mapper.sql: id, red_money, create_time, finish_time, customer_id, brand_id, shop_detail_id, red_remainder_money, red_type, order_id, state
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_red_packet
id, red_money, create_time, finish_time, customer_id, brand_id, shop_detail_id, red_remainder_money, red_type, order_id, state,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redRemainderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId}, #{state},
mapper.select: select * from tb_red_packet where customer_id = #{customerId} and red_remainder_money > 0 and red_type = ${redType} ORDER BY create_time asc LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: update tb_red_packet set red_remainder_money = red_remainder_money + ${payValue}, finish_time = null where id = #{Id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.shop_detail_id shopDetailId, COUNT(1) redCount, SUM(r.red_money) redMoney, IFNULL(SUM(r.useCount),0) useRedCount, IFNULL(SUM(r.useMoney),0) useRedMoney FROM ( SELECT trp.shop_detail_id, trp.red_money, IF(COUNT(1) = 1 and top.id is null,0,COUNT(1)) useCount, SUM(top.pay_value) useMoney FROM tb_red_packet trp LEFT JOIN tb_order_payment_item top ON top.to_pay_id = trp.id AND top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate}, ' 23:59:59') WHERE trp.red_type IN (${redType}) AND trp.create_time >= CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND trp.create_time <= CONCAT(#{grantEndDate}, ' 23:59:59') GROUP BY trp.id ) r GROUP BY r.shop_detail_id

select trp.id id, trp.customer_id cid, trp.order_id orderId, trp.red_money `value`, trp.create_time createTime, o.customer_id customerId, c.nickname nickName, c.head_photo headPhoto, d.`name` shopName from tb_red_packet trp LEFT JOIN tb_order o ON trp.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN tb_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN resto_brand.shop_detail d ON d.id = o.shop_detail_id where trp.customer_id = #{customerId} and trp.order_id is not null and trp.red_type = 1 order by trp.create_time desc LIMIT #{currentPage},#{showCount}
